# ac-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                          | Type                              |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  | The HTML5 native disable prop.                                                                                       | `boolean`                         |
| `fill`     | `fill`      | Fill mode: * flat - No borders and no raising * solid - Default raised button * clear - No background and no borders | `"clear" \| "flat" \| "solid"`    |
| `href`     | `href`      | An optional link to open when click on it. Turns the button into a anchor element.                                   | `string`                          |
| `iconOnly` | `icon-only` | Icon only mode, with a square button, centered icon.                                                                 | `boolean`                         |
| `size`     | `size`      | The size of the button: * small - height: 36px * big - height: 50px * default - 44px                                 | `"big" \| "small"`                |
| `target`   | `target`    | The HTML5 native anchor target to handle the href property.                                                          | `string`                          |
| `theme`    | `theme`     | The theme color. The default is white.                                                                               | `string`                          |
| `tooltip`  | `tooltip`   | The native HTML5 title attribute.                                                                                    | `string`                          |
| `type`     | `type`      | The HTML5 button type. See https://mdn.io/button                                                                     | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
